en.name: BeanCounter-Turbo
en.description: Introducing BeanCounter-Turbo, the efficiency powerhouse for coffee enthusiasts and professionals. After 9 months of refinement based on user feedback, BC-Turbo redefines coffee efficiency with three core upgrades: Turbo Gear technology (20g in 5 seconds with ±0.2g accuracy), full-color touchscreen interface, and minimalist industrial design with solid CNC aluminum base. Enhanced bean storage with 50% improved airtight seal locks in freshness. Perfect for busy mornings or high-volume cafes.
en.note: The top cover plate and bean transport core are created by 3D print, which may have small surface variations and imperfections that do not impact the function of the device. This is not a artwork level product, so please be aware of that if you mind.

specifications.Dimensions: L:125 mm W:100 mm H:260 mm

en.shipping: In-stock orders ship within 2 days. Pre-orders2 to 3 weeks to ship after purchase. Shipping free in China.

warranty.homeUse: 1 years from date of delivery for anything that could be deemed a manufacturing defect or malfunction. Does not apply to normal wear & tear. When in doubt, contact us and we'll be happy to help.
warranty.commercialUse: 6mo from date of delivery for anything that could be deemed a manufacturing error or malfunction. Does not apply to normal wear & tear.
warranty.accessories: 60 days from date of delivery for manufacturing defect. Does not apply to normal wear & tear or misuse. When in doubt, contact us and we'll be happy to help.
warranty.exchanges: We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, contact us and we will work with you to send the package back to its place of origin.
warranty.shippingReturn: To return your product, please contact us for the correct shipping location depending on where you live. You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund. Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you, may vary.

zh.name: BeanCounter-Turbo 数豆机
zh.tagline: 极速引擎 精准称豆
zh.description: 早晨做咖啡，时间搞不赢？SharkaCoffee推出新款数豆机BeanCounter-Turbo，集效率、颜值于一身。历经9个多月打磨，汲取用户及设计师反馈，全新升级三大核心：Turbo Gear极速引擎（20g咖啡豆仅需5秒，±0.2g精准度）、全彩触控屏智能交互、实心CNC铝合金底座极简工业美学。全新豆仓设计，气密性提升50%，锁住更多新鲜。无论个人玩家还是咖啡店，BC-Turbo都能使你的咖啡制作更高效、优雅。美好的早晨，从一杯优雅的咖啡开始。
zh.note: 顶盖板和豆子传送核心由3D打印制成，可能存在不影响设备功能的小表面变化和瑕疵。这不是艺术品级别的产品，如果您介意请知悉。

specifications.尺寸: 长:125 mm 宽:100 mm 高:260 mm
specifications.续航时间: 连续运行约11.67小时，待机约47.5小时
specifications.模式: 手动称量模式/自动称量模式

zh.shipping: 现货订单两天内发货。预定订单购买后2至3周发货。中国境内免运费。

en.name: SC-Grinder Scale
en.description: Collaborate with the grinder for continual cup grinding, high precise weighting and auto offset calculation to speed-up the process of coffee making.
en.note: This scale is designed to work with manual grinders or motorized grinders with external trigger capability. Some modifications to your grinder may be required.

specifications.Dimensions: W:110 mm L:110 mm H:22 mm

en.name: Coffeeder Slow Bean Feeder
en.tagline: Gear-Driven Slow Bean Feeder for Coffee Grinders
en.description: The Coffeeder is an innovative slow bean feeding device designed to work with coffee grinders. By controlling the bean feeding speed, it reduces fines production, improves coffee flavor, and prevents grinder jamming when grinding light roasts. Perfect for grinders that struggle with lighter roasted beans.
package: 1x Coffeeder Slow Bean Feeder (Silver or Black)
1x grinder adapter ring (to fit grinder bean entry)
en.note: Available in Silver and Black. Please specify your preferred color when ordering. If your grinder bean entry diameter is larger than 82mm, or is irregularly shaped or tilted, we can customize a specific grinder adapter ring for free. For more grinder compatibility needs, please contact us.

specifications.Dimensions: Compact design for standard grinder hoppers

en.shipping: In-stock orders ship within 2 days. Free shipping within China. International shipping available, rates calculated at checkout.

zh.name: Coffeeder 慢速下豆器
zh.tagline: 齿轮驱动的磨豆机慢速下豆装置
zh.description: Coffeeder 是一款创新的慢速下豆装置，专为配合咖啡磨豆机使用而设计。通过控制下豆速度，可以减少研磨过程中产生的细粉，改善咖啡风味，并防止磨豆机在研磨浅烘焙咖啡豆时卡死。特别适合处理浅烘焙豆子时性能不足的磨豆机。
package: 1个 Coffeeder 慢速下豆器（银色或黑色）
1个 磨豆机转接环（适配磨豆机豆仓入口）
zh.note: 提供银色和黑色两种颜色可选。订购时请注明您偏好的颜色。如果磨豆机入豆口直径大于82mm，或异形或者整体为倾斜，我们可免费定制一款指定磨豆机转接环,如有更多磨豆机适配需求请联系我们。

specifications.尺寸: 紧凑设计，适配标准磨豆机豆仓
